#summary A view sync version of tron tank webgl demo using websockets

= Introduction =

Multi-machine view synchronisation attempt for a WebGL app.

= Requirements & Source =

Grab original "tron-tank" source from http://scenejs.org/dist/curr/extr/examples/tron-tank/index.html

Download Perl libraries needed for "relay-websocket.pl"

vti's Perl libraries for ReAnimator. See 

http://showmetheco.de/articles/2010/11/timtow-to-build-a-websocket-server-in-perl

Download tronlg.html, tron-tank-lg.js and relay-websocket.pl from this Source repo /trunk/tron-tank/

Modifiy tron-tank-lg.js replacing the WebSocket server IP address with the IP of the machine running the Perl Websocket relay'er.

= How to run it =

./relay_websocket.pl
